original_text: And I will direct my jealousy against you, that they may deal with you in fury. They shall cut off your nose and your ears, and your survivors shall fall by the sword. They shall seize your sons and your daughters, and your survivors shall be devoured by fire.
korean_text: 내가 너를 향하여 질투하리니 그들이 분내어 네 코와 귀를 깎아 버리고 남은 자를 칼로 엎드러뜨리며 네 자녀를 빼앗고 그 남은 자를 불에 사르며

sentences.original_text: And I will direct my jealousy against you
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나는 내 질투를 너에게 향하게 하리라

sentences.original_text: that they may deal with you in fury
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 분노로 너를 대하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: They shall cut off your nose and your ears
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 네 코와 네 귀를 베어버릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: and your survivors shall fall by the sword
They shall seize your sons and your daughters
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 네 아들들과 네 딸들을 잡을 것이며

sentences.original_text: and your survivors shall be devoured by fire
